article_title: Why Not Use Tax Preparers To Sign People Up For ObamaCare?

article_metadata.description: Given all the tax credits involved in the Affordable Care Act, it makes a lot of sense to make your purchase of health insurance a relatively seamless part of filing your tax return.
article_metadata.author: Business in the Beltway
